required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Effect of GFA-918 on Serum Triglyceride Levels in Individuals With Elevated Serum Triglyceride
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Parallel Study to Evaluate the Effect of GFA-918 on Serum Triglyceride Levels in Individuals With Elevated Serum Triglyceride

brief_summary.textblock: In this study, a lipase -sourced from a nonpyrogenic yeast, Candida rugosa, will be investigated to establish optimal TG levels in adults in a 12-week supplementation period. The investigational product provides a lipase formulation that is stable and active in acidic and neutral pH environments, while also fully digesting TGs into free fatty acids and glycerol which is beyond the scope of pancreatic lipase (Schuler et al. 2012). This will be a novel study investigating the effects of C. rugosa lipase on adults with slightly elevated TG levels.

primary_outcome.measure: The change in levels of fasting serum TG levels
primary_outcome.description: The primary outcome of this study is the change in levels of fasting serum TG levels from screening to week 12 in fasting serum TG levels between GFA-918 and placebo groups.

secondary_outcome.measure: The change in levels of triglycerides
secondary_outcome.description: The change from baseline to week 12 in lipid profile (levels of triglycerides) between GFA-918 and placebo groups

secondary_outcome.measure: The change in levels of total cholesterol
secondary_outcome.description: The change from baseline to week 12 in lipid profile (levels of total cholesterol) between GFA-918 and placebo groups

secondary_outcome.measure: The change in levels of LDL-cholesterol
secondary_outcome.description: The change from baseline to week 12 in lipid profile ( levels of LDL-cholesterol) between GFA-918 and placebo groups

secondary_outcome.measure: The change in levels of VLDL-cholesterol
secondary_outcome.description: The change from baseline to week 12 in lipid profile (levels of VLDL-cholesterol) between GFA-918 and placebo groups

secondary_outcome.measure: The change in levels of HDL-cholesterol
secondary_outcome.description: The change from baseline to week 12 in lipid profile (levels of HDL-cholesterol) between GFA-918 and placebo groups

secondary_outcome.measure: The change in levels of ApoA-I
secondary_outcome.description: The change from baseline to week 12 in lipid profile (levels of ApoA-I) between GFA-918 and placebo groups

secondary_outcome.measure: The change in levels of LDL-C: HDL-C
secondary_outcome.description: The change from baseline to week 12 in lipid profile (LDL-C: HDL-C) between GFA-918 and placebo groups

secondary_outcome.measure: The change in levels of TC: HDL-C
secondary_outcome.description: The change from baseline to week 12 in lipid profile (TC: HDL-C) between GFA-918 and placebo groups

secondary_outcome.measure: The change in levels of apolipoprotein A1 (ApoA-1)
secondary_outcome.description: The change from baseline to week 12 in apolipoprotein A1 (levels of ApoA-1) between GFA-918 and placebo groups.

secondary_outcome.measure: The change in levels of CRP
secondary_outcome.description: The change from baseline to week 12 in levels of the inflammatory biomarker, CRP, between the GFA-918 and placebo groups

secondary_outcome.measure: The change in levels of TNF-α
secondary_outcome.description: The change from baseline to week 12 in levels of the inflammatory biomarker, TNF-α, between the GFA-918 and placebo groups

secondary_outcome.measure: The change in levels of IL-6
secondary_outcome.description: The change from baseline to week 12 in levels of the inflammatory biomarker, IL-6, between the GFA-918 and placebo groups

secondary_outcome.measure: The change in body weight
secondary_outcome.description: The change from screening to week 12 in body weight between GFA-918 and placebo groups.

secondary_outcome.measure: The change in body mass index (BMI)
secondary_outcome.description: The change from screening to week 12 in body mass index (BMI) between the GFA-918 and placebo groups

secondary_outcome.measure: A clinically relevant change in TG after the 12-week supplementation with GFA-918 as assessed by a 1 mmol/L decrease in TG.
secondary_outcome.description: 6A clinically relevant change in TG from screening to week 12 after the 12-week supplementation with GFA-918 as assessed by a 1 mmol/L decrease in TG.

secondary_outcome.measure: A clinically relevant change in HDL-C after supplementation with GFA-918 defined as at least 0.026 mmol/L (1 mg/dL) or 1% increase
secondary_outcome.description: A clinically relevant change in HDL-C, from baseline to week 12 after supplementation with GFA-918 defined as at least 0.026 mmol/L (1 mg/dL) or 1% increase

secondary_outcome.measure: The clinically relevant change in LDL-C after supplementation with GFA-918 defined as a minimal 1% decrease
secondary_outcome.description: The clinically relevant change in LDL-C, from baseline to week 12 after supplementation with GFA-918 defined as a minimal 1% decrease

secondary_outcome.measure: The changes during the follow up period, week 12 to week 14, in levels of fasting serum TG levels
secondary_outcome.description: The changes during the follow up period, week 12 to week 14, in fasting serum TG levels between GFA-918 and placebo groups.

arm_group.description: Participants will be instructed to take one GFA-918 capsule twice per day with their morning and evening meals for 12 weeks.
Participants will be instructed to take one Placebo capsule twice per day with their morning and evening meals for 12 weeks.

intervention.description: Participants will be instructed to take one GFA-918 (125000 FIP Units of Lipase AY) capsule twice per day with their morning and evening meals for 12 weeks.
Participants will be instructed to take one Placebo capsule twice per day with their morning and evening meals for 12 weeks.
